name: Rock Paper Scissors Shoot (mahouoji, wd811)
description:
A game prototype allowing for skill depth

  • WASD to move, Q/E to  switch bullet type, click to shoot
  • Bullets are Rock/Paper/Scissors
  • Winning bullet cancels out losing bullet,
  • Holding the winning bullet make you immune from the losing bullet
  • Bullets of the same type between you and the enemy cancel each other.
